comments.author: BIG SQUEEZER
comments.comment:
I can very easily access my main account on NA but i cant access my PBE account. I wanted to help bug test the new Jihn Champ. http://puu.sh/mNHSr/88538e5aa4.jpg This is proof I have access to my main account

<---> Ticket Summary <--->

Has your account been suspended for a chargeback? || chargeback_no

Your current IP address || 137.140.128.204
The last time that you had access to the account (month/day/year) || 1-2 years ago?

Please explain how you first gained access to this account || Signed up through PBE
Other people (friends/family members) who have ever had access to the account || None

|- I am willing to fill out additional information -|
Has your email account ever been compromised? If so, which email and when (month and year) || Nope
How did you lose access to your account? || I cant input my username or password

comments.author: Agent
comments.comment:
Summoner,

Thank you for providing me with this information. We have a Support Team in place dedicated to working with issues like this one, so I need to transfer your ticket to someone with the tools to resolve your issue.

Thank you so much for your patience!

Rayfizz
Riot Player Support

comments.author: Agent
comments.comment:
Hey Summoner,

It’s me Hidden Ki from the Account Team! I want to thank you for your patience during our investigation of the PBE account in question. With that said, I’m happy to inform you that I’ve just sent out a password reset for your PBE account to your email imzessed@gmail.com. That email contains a temporary password for you to use. 

However, at the moment, the link to complete the password reset will not send you to the correct location.  Instead, visit this site to reset your password:

http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/

Since this site is still under development, I recommend using this guide to complete your password reset:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904

Please note that, like the PBE client, our PBE website is also in beta stages. This means that specific tools may disappear and the page will sometimes go blank when unscheduled maintenance is needed. If you are seeing a blank page I suggest holding off and attempting the reset at a later time. If this issue seems to not be going away I recommend changing your internet browser (Chrome, Firefox, Internet Explorer, etc.) to make sure the blank page is not due to a local browser setting.

For some tips on keeping your account secure, check out our Knowledge Base:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664

If you have any other questions or concerns, please feel free to contact us again.


Hidden Ki
Billing and Account Support
